metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46361 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Artifex Software jbig2dec v0.20 was discovered to contain a SEGV vulnerability via jbig2_error at /jbig2dec/jbig2.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> null pointer dereference bug listed below contains similar issue as of 2023-11-01, there is no fix available from the jbig2dec developers ccdm94> fix released on 2023-11-05. focal and earlier are not affected by this issue, as they do not include the changes from commit f9d37c7c, meaning, the uninitialized variable that causes the issue is not present in the code.

criterions.comment: jbig2dec: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
